job.title: Account Manager - CMO, GMP, Pharmaceuticals
job.description:
If you are a Account Manager with experience with CMO and GMP, please read on!
We are a quickly growing Biotech company looking to add an experienced Account Manager to our team. The ideal candidate would possess at least 3 years of experience in the field with a background in Biotech.
What You Will Be Doing
Working with current clients to establish needs and timelines
Managing project deadlines and communication between client and production
Business development processes to build new clientele
Working with local and international clients
Act as the liaison between marketing, production, and clients
What You Need for this Position
CMO
GMP
Pharmaceuticals
Project Deadlines
Project Management
International Clients
What's In It for You
Competitive salary and earnings
Full benefits offered
Endless growth potential
Great leadership
Passionate team members
We are actively interviewing for this role, so please APPLY TODAY!
Email Your Resume In Word To
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Shauna.Hillegas@CyberCoders.com
Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : SH6-1647423 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***
Shauna Hillegas - Recruiter - CyberCoders
Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.
CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
Your Right to Work
- In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
